faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about AI Lens Correction

items.title: What types of lens distortions can be corrected?
items.description: WaveSpeed AI can fix various lens distortions such as barrel distortion, pincushion distortion, and perspective distortion, enhancing overall image clarity.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Users receive 30 complimentary credits daily, allowing multiple corrections. Earn more credits through surveys or challenges on Discord. For high-volume needs, subscription plans are available.

items.title: Can I use corrected images for commercial purposes?
items.description: Paid subscribers can use their corrected images commercially. Free-tier users can use them for personal projects but must refrain from commercial use. Please refer to our Terms of Service for details.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All corrections are performed on your device in your browser. No images are uploaded or stored, ensuring complete privacy and security. Once the tab is closed, all data is deleted.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now to experience flawless lens correction. No sign-up required.
